Instruction: Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a square 8x8 inch baking pan.
Cream together the sugar, butter, egg, and vanilla extract for about 10 minutes until soft and creamy using an electric mixer.
Stir together flour, baking powder, and salt. Add this mixture gradually to the creamed butter mixture, alternating with the maple syrup and milk. Mix until just combined. Pour into the prepared pan.
Bake in a preheated oven until the top is lightly browned and a toothpick inserted comes out clean, approximately 45 minutes. The maple syrup may sink to the bottom during baking. Serve warm.
